posts.post_content:
I think the scans tell the story (though I've included a few notes where applicable). If you'd like higher-resolution images, just let me know.

You can reserve cards via e-mail, PM or posts to the board. Probably best to follow-up with an e-mail in any case.

Payment can be made by check, money order or PayPal. All prices are delivered.

Any questions, fire away.

Thanks,

Rob

wolfie51sb at aol.com

  * Kotton Tobacco Johnny Evers, PSA 1 -- [STRIKE]$500[/STRIKE] $440



  * T206 Piedmont 150 Ty Cobb, green background, SGC 30/2 -- SOLD


  * T206 Piedmont 350 Ty Cobb, red background, SGC 50/4 -- [STRIKE]$1,300[/STRIKE] $1,250



  * T206 Sweet Caporal 350 Ty Cobb, bat off shoulder, SGC A (I think the grade is because of residue on the back of the card; I do not think the card is trimmed) -- [STRIKE]$575[/STRIKE] $525



  * T206 Sweet Caporal 150 Ty Cobb, bat on shoulder, SGC 20/1.5 -- [STRIKE]$500[/STRIKE] $450


  * 
  * 1933 Goudey Babe Ruth No. 181, SGC 40/3 -- [STRIKE]$1,375[/STRIKE] $1,300



  * 1933 Goudey Lou Gehrig No. 160, SGC 20/1.5 (horizontal creases that do not break the paper) -- SOLD


  * 1933 Sport Kings Babe Ruth, SGC 50/4 -- SOLD

Hi Rob
PM sent.
Thanks
Mike

Scans sent, Greg. Please let me know if you haven't received them.

Thanks.

I am seriously interested in the Gehrig.

please email me at [url]paulehawk3@gmail.com[/url]
